籤詩版本二:
Uqweqwe lwekhekhe lunemibala eminingi, futhi inhlanhla iletha inhlanhla nenhlanhla.
Akufanele abantu bangaleso sikhathi bazisole ngokuthi baduma sekwephuzile futhi baduma umhlaba wonke ngesikhathi esisodwa.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuqweqwe lweqhwa ekhekheni.
Inhlanhla kukho konke.
解曰: Okudala kuba okusha. Thumela ezintweni eziqediwe. Ngakho ukuphila kwakhe ukuvelela. Konke kuyisiphetho.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liang Haodengke
Isazi, uLiang Hao (963-1004), igama lokuhlonipha u-Taisu, wazalelwa eXucheng, e-Yunzhou (manje eyi-Dongping, eShandong) oBukhosini beNgoma.
Ngesikhathi sokubusa kukaYongxi, waphumelela ukuhlolwa kweJnshi eneminyaka eyishumi nesishiyagalombili. Ukuqhubeka nokufaka isicelo sokuhlolwa kwehlulekile.
Waqala ukubhala izivivinyo ngonyaka wesithathu we-Tianfu. Wayephumelela ukuhlolwa njalo ngonyaka phakathi Nobukhosi BakwaHan Bamuva kanye Nobukhosi BakaZhou Bamuva, kodwa wahluleka minyaka yonke. Ufunge wagomela ukuthi ngeke axolelane uma engawutholi umklomelo wokuqala.
Lapho eneminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili nambili, ngonyaka wesibili wokubusa kukaYongxi koMbusi uZhenzong woBukhosi Bengoma, wawina umklomelo wokuqala.
聖意: Thandazela ukuphepha kwekhaya (okujabulisayo), ukuphepha komuntu siqu, inzuzo yezezimali, ukuthengiselana, umshado, abahamba ngezinyawo besilisa baseLiujia, izikelemu zaseChitian, amaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili, izilwane eziyisithupha, ukucinga abantu, amacala omphakathi, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekile, izifo zasenyakatho-ntshonalanga, inzuzo enkulu yaseFushan
